name: The Underworld
description:
Your lost in a world that you don't remember...

You died while walking your cat. Your only option is to escape and get back to your normal life. The gateway is near the scale. This is your only chance...

The Underworld is an Undertale inspired game with dialog and platformer gameplay.

Controls:

Wasd - move

Right mouse - Boost

-spacebar - jump

-spacebar(against walls) - walljump.

CONTROLLER CONTROLS:

left move stick - move

Right top trigger - Boost

- A (green button) - jump

-A (against walls) - Walljump
